definition[0]: to officially and legally give money or property to someone else
example[0]: He made over the whole estate to his son.
definition[1]: to change someone or something so that they look different or have a different use
example[1]: Redgrave has made herself over completely for her movie role.
definition[2]: to officially and legally give money or property to someone
example[2]: He made over his share in the estate in return for $10,000 cash.
